data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3237437,"name":"","username":"NiS26","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nis26/{size}/241986_2.png","created_at":"2023-10-04T14:03:15.978Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe are trying to use PathPlanner for simple autonomous paths like GoForward one meter, but rather our bot goes almost double. Our drive encoder is the relative encoder for the neo and we have a cancoder for our turn.  We’ve been experimenting with different positionconversionfactors, none of which seem to be going the right distance. We’re using a MK4i Swerve Module with an overall gear ratio of 6.75, and our wheel radius is 0.0508 meters. We think that our encoders are not being read correctly, as it reliably goes to a certain point, just not the want we want it to go to. It could also be the velocity, because our PathPlanner path is 1.15 seconds long, which is how long the robot goes, it’s just that the distance is off. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Here’s our code: \u003ca href=\"https://github.com/9114-Rotationaries/CalGames2023/tree/Auto\" class=\"inline-onebox\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003eGitHub - 9114-Rotationaries/CalGames2023 at Auto\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2023-10-04T14:03:15.978Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":17,"reads":36,"readers_count":35,"score":92.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":441853,"topic_slug":"setpositionconversionfactor-not-afftecting-pathplanner-path","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://github.com/9114-Rotationaries/CalGames2023/tree/Auto","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"GitHub - 9114-Rotationaries/CalGames2023 at Auto","clicks":5}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":60138,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/setpositionconversionfactor-not-afftecting-pathplanner-path/441853/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3430192,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2024-10-03T14:03:43.180Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
